resources.string: Health E will be an app aimed at gamers seeking to become more healthy. The app will begin with a fitness test to gauge fitness level. The more you workout , the higher your fitness level becomes. The app is designed to ease the less athletically inclined to keeping a regular workout schedule/habits.This will consist of mostly simple body weight workouts that can be done at home. There is a lot of room for expansion of including features to help eating habits and sleep.
